# maskInset

**Instance Property**

The insets from the edges of the full screen layout.

## Declaration

```swift
attribute double Object maskInset;
```

## Modifying a Browser

- **interitemSpacing**: The spacing between full screen browser items.
- **cornerRadius**: The corner radius of each full screen browser item.

items.description: The spacing between full screen browser items.
